content: How disingenuous. Defending free speech is easy when you only defend speech you agree with. But that makes free speech worthless. “I disagree with what you say, but I will defend to the death your right to say it”. So if your aim is to ban speech, of whatever kind, it’s best to start by pointing out the most extreme examples. This is no different than claiming “When technologists allow people to post pictures on the Internet, they play directly into the hands of child pornographers”. You don’t like child pornography, DO YOU?? So we must ban people from posting pictures.
